fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Invited Seminar for the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
fields.Sponsoring Organization: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
fields.Description/Abstract:
Dr. Chris Haskell is a faculty member and director of the new Varsity eSports program at Boise State University. Join Dr. Haskell and co-Presidents from the UNC eSports Club, Shane Steele-Pardue and Irene Zhou, to learn more about the national explosion in eSports, and how you can get involved.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=re-KLwVC7d8
